info.name: User Management API
info.description:
Complete API collection for User Management System with JWT Authentication, Role-Based Authorization, and Avatar Upload.

## Features:
- JWT Authentication
- Role-Based Access Control (USER, ADMIN, MODERATOR)
- User CRUD Operations
- Avatar Upload
- Role Management

## Setup:
1. Create first ADMIN user (no token required)
2. Login to get JWT token
3. Set token in Authorization tab for protected endpoints

## Environment Variables:
- `base_url`: http://localhost:3000
- `access_token`: Your JWT token (auto-set after login)

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Login with email and password to get JWT access token.

**Request Body:**
- email (required): User email
- password (required): User password

**Response:**
- accessToken: JWT token for authentication
- user: User information

**Note:** Token is automatically saved to environment variable `access_token`

Get current user profile from JWT token.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer Token)

**Response:**
- userId
- email
- name
- role
- isActive
- createdAt
- updatedAt

Logout user.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer Token)

**Note:** Client should delete stored token after logout

item.name: Users

request.description:
Create first user without authentication.

**⚠️ IMPORTANT:**
- Only works when database is empty (0 users)
- First user MUST have role "ADMIN"
- After first user is created, this endpoint requires admin authentication

**Request Body:**
- userId (required): Unique user identifier
- email (required): Valid email, unique
- password (required): Min 8 chars, must have uppercase, lowercase, number, special char
- name (optional): User full name
- role (required): Must be "ADMIN" for first user

**Validation:**
- If role is not "ADMIN", returns 400: "Invalid parameters"
- Server log will show: "Failed to create first user: Role must be ADMIN"

Create new user (Admin only).

**Authentication:** Required - Admin Bearer Token

**Authorization:** Only users with ADMIN role

**Request Body:**
- userId (required): Unique user identifier
- email (required): Valid email, unique
- password (required): Min 8 chars, strong password
- name (optional): User full name
- role (optional): USER, ADMIN, or MODERATOR (default: USER)

**Response:** 201 Created with user object

Get list of all users.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer Token)

**Authorization:** Admin only

**Response:** Array of user objects

Get user details by ID.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer Token)

**Authorization:**
- Users can only view their own data
- Admins can view any user's data

**Path Parameters:**
- userId: User identifier

**Response:** User object with all details

Update user information.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer Token)

**Authorization:**
- Users can only update their own data
- Admins can update any user's data

**Path Parameters:**
- userId: User identifier

**Request Body (partial update):**
- name (optional): New name
- email (optional): New email
- password (optional): New password
- role (optional): New role (admin only)

**Response:** Updated user object

Delete user (Admin only).

**Authentication:** Required - Admin Bearer Token

**Authorization:** Only users with ADMIN role

**Path Parameters:**
- userId: User identifier to delete

**Response:** 204 No Content on success

formdata.description: Image file (jpg, jpeg, png, gif). Max size: 5MB

request.description:
Upload user avatar image.

**Authentication:** Required (Bearer Token)

**Authorization:**
- Users can only upload their own avatar
- Admins can upload avatar for any user

**Path Parameters:**
- userId: User identifier

**Request Body (form-data):**
- avatar: Image file

**File Validation:**
- Allowed formats: jpg, jpeg, png, gif
- Max file size: 5MB
- Files stored in: ./uploads/avatars/

**Response:**
- message: Success message
- avatar: Saved filename
- url: Public URL to access avatar

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "message": "Avatar uploaded successfully",
  "avatar": "avatar-1733400000000-123456789.jpg",
  "url": "/uploads/avatars/avatar-1733400000000-123456789.jpg"
}
```

**Access Avatar:**
http://localhost:3000/uploads/avatars/avatar-1733400000000-123456789.jpg

request.description:
Get list of all roles.

**Authentication:** Not required (Public endpoint)

**Response:** Array of role objects

Create new role (Admin only).

**Authentication:** Required - Admin Bearer Token

**Authorization:** Only users with ADMIN role

**Request Body:**
- roleName (required): Role name (e.g., MODERATOR)
- description (optional): Role description

**Response:** 201 Created with role object

Update role information (Admin only).

**Authentication:** Required - Admin Bearer Token

**Authorization:** Only users with ADMIN role

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Role ID or role name

**Request Body:**
- roleName (optional): New role name
- description (optional): New description

**Response:** Updated role object

Delete role (Admin only).

**Authentication:** Required - Admin Bearer Token

**Authorization:** Only users with ADMIN role

**Path Parameters:**
- id: Role ID or role name to delete

**Response:** 204 No Content on success
